title: [LFM] :: At`Ez eSports Platinum-Diamond
body:
**At`Ez is a multi-gaming eSports organization**

**At`Ez is an Australian eSports Organization collecting some of the best players in the nation to represent At`Ez. We are fed by the Australian Gaming Community. We support our players to seek the highest Australian level.**

**We are looking to be one of the worlds top eSport organizations with teams in Dota 2, League of Legends, BattleParty, Rocket League and CS:GO.**


_______________________________________________________________________

**Application:**

Summoner name in League of Legends:
Age:
Current Rank:
Can you use Teamspeak?:
Previous Experience in League of Legends:
Current Competitive status in League of Legends:
Short Bio:
_______________________________________________________________________

**Requirement:**
• Working Microphone - (TeamSpeak 3, Skype, CurseVoice)
• Mature.
• Over 16 years old.
• Can handle criticism.
• Non Salty / Toxic.
• Friendly / Good Personality.

**In game:**
• Over 2-3 years experience in League of Legends.
• Must be Platinum-Diamond in game rank.
• Must be able to train/practice consistently
_______________________________________________________________________

**Contact:**
_LoL Name_:  Mikoly313
_Steam:_  http://steamcommunity.com/id/Mikoly/
_Skype:_  mikoly313_mik313_33_11
_TeamSpeak 3:_  108.61.169.86:9261

replies.body:
Why the hell do you need to know peoples Username? 

You really don't need it and it's rather private.
Username as in for the name to add you off and in game name being your main IGN

Yo I've changed it to only request Summoner name for now. If you want to add people that should be all you need. Asking for username isn't entirely wrong depending on your purposes but for your current intent Summoner name is fine.

The name to add you off in-game and your IGN are the same thing.

This doesn't seem very professional.

-_-, i cant tell if your trolling, how is an org supposed to approach a player/talk to a player without knowing their name/ign. its like going for a job interview and then not asking for your name. think of it

You are completely misunderstanding.

He is asking for your login username AND your in-game summoner name. One of which, he doesn't need.

Hey! I recommend asking for your applicant's summoner name instead of username. Summoner name is the name that you see in game, when looking at someone's profile, and what you use to add a person to your friends list, whereas usernames should remain private. Hope this helps clear things up!

Summoner name in League of Legends: The Sad King
Age: 18
Current Rank: Plat
Can you use TeamSpeak?: Yes i have nearly every communication application 
Previous Experience in League of Legends: 2731 hours 114 been playing for 3 years.
Current Competitive status in League of Legends: I have not been part of a full on 5's team but i very keen on it
Short Bio: I'm a dedicated league player willing to learn all the time i very keen on meeting new people! very friendly and i have good team communication, I'm not easily tilted when games get rough i believe we can always win.

I main support but can play jungle adc and mid at a high level. Im from Brisbane and I work full time as en Electrician.
